about_the_game: The acclaimed, original soundtrack for I See Red. Two thrilling albums with all the tracks that make up the game's dynamic music system. Get the best of robot, alien and human tracks plus some secrets, legacy themes, and exclusive extras!
detailed_description: The acclaimed, original soundtrack for I See Red. Two thrilling albums with all the tracks that make up the game's dynamic music system. Get the best of robot, alien and human tracks plus some secrets, legacy themes, and exclusive extras!
